description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 3 (Air Extraction System) of planning permission reference 8393/APP/2006/2638, dated 09-11-2006, for Erection of Cafe and Security Hut with associated landscaping within existing business park.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The applicant is advised that this consent relates solely to the discharge of Condition 3 of planning consent reference 8393/APP/2006/2638 and the proposed extraction details only. It is advised that should the applicant propose the use of the property as a hot food takeaway for the sale of hot food where consumption of that food is mostly undertaken off the premises, this would require separate planning consent.
